content:
# I successfully harvested 10 units of iron ore, and my inventory now contains:
# - 5 units of stone
# - 10 units of iron ore
# - 1 unit of iron plate

# Now that I have iron ore in my inventory, I can proceed to insert it into the stone furnace for smelting.

# Let's insert the 6 units of iron ore into the furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=6)  # Insert 6 units of iron ore into the furnace.

# After inserting the iron ore, I'll check the smelting process for the next 30 seconds.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum wait time
    if inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 7:  # Check if all 6 iron ore has been converted to iron plates
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# After the smelting is done, I'll check the inventory again.
print(f"Inventory after smelting remaining iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Entities on the map after smelting: {get_entities()}")
